import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./Header.css"; const Head = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const header = this.document.querySelector(".header"); if (this.scrollY >= 80) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }) const [Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState("#home"); return (
